page.title: 05Children's playground games
page.content: A modern game is{'Knee-high'}in which players take turns to kick a ball against a wall. A person is 'out' if he misses the ball or if it touches him above the knee. In{'British Bulldog'}a person in the middle of the playground is 'on'. He chooses a person who then has to cross the playground without being caught. If he is caught that person becomes 'on'. To play{'Dicky Levo'}one team hides while another counts and then tries to find the 'hiding' team. When someone is found the finder shouts, "Dicky Levo! One, two, three!" The 'hiding' team then has to try and free the person caught by 'tigging' or touching them without being caught themselves. When all the team is caught the sides swap over and the game begins again.
